projects.name: Hotstar - Clone
projects.description: The Hoststar clone frontend made with React JS and Tailwind is a high-performance and responsive user interface that replicates the look and feel of the original Hoststar website.

projects.name: YouTube - Clone
projects.description: A YouTube clone made with HTML, JavaScript, and the YouTube API is a web application that mimics the functionality of the original YouTube platform.

projects.name: Periodic Table
projects.description: A periodic table website made with React is a digital representation of the chemical elements organized in the form of a periodic table.

projects.name: TextUtils - Text Editor
projects.description: TextUtils is a text editor website made with React, which allows users to input, edit and format text in real-time.

projects.name: Spotify - Clone
projects.description: A Spotify website clone made with HTML and CSS is a web application that replicates the look and feel of the original Spotify website.
